name: The Hostage Trials - (old) (Canceled)
blurb: A new kind of real time game for iOS and Android that pits you against a villain (David Hayter) who has kidnapped your friend.

name: Joel and Jared Erickson - Gnarly Tooth

rewards.reward: No Reward

I GOT MY COPY!  There. That was easy. You've pre-ordered your copy of The Hostage Trials for iOS or Android. There will also be a version specifically designed for WiFi only devices (e.g. iPod Touch) that does not use GPS or cellular data features. You can choose either one.

NOW THAT'S A COOL DESKTOP! All previous tiers AND three "Hostage Trials" wallpapers  for all of your digital devices, exclusive to Kickstarter backers. A digital thank you card and your name in the game credits listed as an backer.
DUDE, LOVE YOUR RINGTONE!: All previous tiers AND you'll receive two "Hostage Trials" ringtones. The same epic pieces that the sound designers are coming up with for the game.

GET OUT THE VOTE! All previous tiers AND you'll get exclusive voting privileges through the company website. You'll help us choose game content such as minor character names, challenge ideas and features, even awesome one-liners for David Hayter's character! We'll take all good ideas into consideration for the votes. We want this to be a community inspired game.

BRING BACK SECRET CODES! **Exlusive Game Content** All previous rewards tiers AND you'll get access to a secret digital file downloaded from the game's website. Hidden within the file will be working phone numbers that can be dialed within the game. Calling the numbers and following the directions reveals more of the back story from "The Hostage Trials" universe. It will be a mini-game within the game and only backers will know how to access it! (If this doesn't make sense, be sure to read the game description.)

THE INSIDE SCOOP! All of the above tiers AND exclusive access to the "The Hostage Trials" production diary videos. We'll be documenting all aspects of this game and you'll get access to our behind the scenes footage as we work on the gameplay design, sound design, voice over sessions and more.

READ THE SCRIPT! All previous tiers AND the original game script! There's a lot of dialogue in this game and chances are you won't hear it all as you play through. You'll get a digital PDF of the original game script with lines from every one of the games possibilities. Just don't read it before you actually finish the game. We hate spoilers.

PEOPLE STILL SEND POSTCARDS! **Exclusive Game Content** All previous tiers AND you'll get a real handwritten postcard from "the villain" delivered to your house. His postcard will contain info on how to access more secret game content and goodies made specifically for Kickstarter backers. (additional $5 pledge for international shipping)
THE CLASSIC T-SHIRT! All previous tiers AND a "Hostage Trials" t-shirt that will act as cool swag for you and free advertising for us! Win win! (additional $10 pledge for international shipping)

THE DOSSIER THAT DOESN'T EXIST: **Even More Exclusive Game Content** All previous tiers AND the villain's dossier! This is the ultimate collector's edition of the game. You'll get an official dossier mailed to your home with all of the government's known information on the one currently known to you only as "the villain." The dossier will include surveillance photos, documents, and once again, trails to even more hidden goodies that will be accessible in the game, but only if you know where to look. This information will not be released to the general public...ever! (additional $10 pledge for international shipping)

CALL ME BRO! All previous tiers AND we'll make the phone number of your choice a working number within the world of the game AND include a recorded message from you! If players call the number while playing they'll hear your message. The game's website will contain a list of these numbers (like a virtual phone book) and you'll be able to choose to have your game number listed (with or without your name) or keep it private for just your friends to dial.

HEY! THAT'S FIDO! We need pictures of various pets for a certain part of the game. Send us your best picture of your pet and it will be included in at least one of the games challenges. Plus previous reward tiers (minus limited rewards).

HEY IT'S COLD WHERE I'M FROM! All previous tiers AND a limited run "Hostage Trials" hoodie for those chillier days. We'll have a variety to choose from and they will be exclusive to backers. (additional $10 pledge for international shipping)

I JUST SAW MY NAME! This is an adventure game folks. We've got plenty of ways to have your name show up in "The Hostage Trials" You will see your name during one of the challenges, and it will be seamlessly blended into the game universe. Let us immortalize you for your posterity. Plus all previous reward tiers. (minus limited rewards).

I SAW MY NAME AND GOT THIS HOODIE TOO! This tier gets your name in the game during one of the hostage challenges AND you'll get a limited run backer only hoodie. Plus all previous reward tiers. (minus limited rewards).

SNAKE AND I ARE OUT! David Hayter will record a personalized message as Snake for you to use as your voicemail. Seriously, there's nothing that this guy wouldn't do for his fans! Plus previous reward tiers (minus limited rewards).

HE SIGNED MY POSTER! At this level you'll get a very cool limited run "Hostage Trials" poster signed by David Hayter and exclusive to backers. We'd sign it too, but you probably don't care about our signatures. You'll also get a special video thank you message from David Hayter himself sent via email. Plus previous reward tiers (minus limited rewards).

I DESIGNED THAT! While voting on challenges is fun, actually being able to design one is awesome! The villain has a variety of things that he asks you to do when he calls. Be part of the creative team and help us design a real-time day in the game. We'll set up a Skype video conference to hammer it out with you. Plus previous reward tiers (minus limited rewards).

SNAKE JUST SAID MY NAME! We'll have David Hayter's character mention your full name and hometown as part of the actual game dialogue! This not only benefits you, but everyone with your exact same name whose from the same town! How nice of you. Don't worry. We'll make this natural too. Plus previous tiers (minus limited rewards).

THAT'S MY VOICE! Your voice (unaltered) will be featured in one of the games challenges! If you can get to Sony Pictures Studios in Culver City, CA we'll record your lines. (You must make your own travel and hotel arrangements.) Record dates will be throughout the summer 2012 and we'll work with you to schedule a date. Plus previous rewards tiers (minus limited rewards).

COME TO THE BOOTH! You and one guest will be invited to come into the booth with David Hayter and the voice over director during one session of the voice over recordings for the game. He says he does better with a crowd. We'll fly you out to Hollywood, CA, put you up in a nice hotel, and take you out for a great lunch on the recording day! Plus all previous rewards (minus limited rewards. Must live in continental US).
